channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 15: Lines, Spreads for all 16 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for every NFL Week 15 matchup.

item.title: 2025 NFL Power Rankings Week 15: The Race to the Super Bowl Is Wide Open
item.description: Ralph Vacchiano sorts out the NFL's hierarchy after every week of the 2025 season.

item.title: Favorite 'Dogs: Back Lions to Test 1st-Place Rams
item.description: The Rams' defense will face a real test in Week 15 with the high-powered offense of the Lions in town. Will Hill delivers his favorite underdog picks.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 Odds: Rams, Seahawks Top Board; How Far Did Eagles Fall?
item.description: Will the next Super Bowl champion come from the NFC West? Or can the Eagles somehow return to form? Here's the latest.

item.title: 2025 College Football Playoff, Bowl Buzz: 5 Ole Miss Coaches Delaying LSU Move
item.description: Here's the latest on what's happening around college football during the College Football Playoff and Bowl Games.

item.title: MLB winter meetings updates, rumors and predictions: The latest buzz from Orlando
item.description: Here's everything you need as baseball's hot stove season heats up.

item.title: CFP Anger Index: An absurd farce over Notre Dame, Miami
item.description: Evaluating the committee's ranking process, and what teams should be most upset about in final CFP ranking.

item.title: Peralta to Red Sox? Greene to Dodgers? Best fits for top potential pitching trade candidates
item.description: A number of teams have the need -- and means -- to trade for a starting pitcher this winter. Here's how they match up with available hurlers.

item.title: Everything Shams is hearing on NBA trade season: Where could Anthony Davis land?
item.description: As trade season nears, the futures of Davis and Giannis Antetokounmpo are in focus. Here's everything we're hearing.

item.title: Chargers pull ahead in OT to defeat Eagles in tight MNF win
item.description: It was the biggest win of the season for a Chargers team that appeared to be spiraling out of playoff contention.
